tag_list: people, recruitment, personnel, ned, staff, hr, sausages
overview: Simon Marchant-Jones is a non-practising chartered accountant who has specialised in providing people to businesses for the past ten years. Whatever the business issue you are facing - start up, business planning, systems, processes, turnaround - Simon usually knows someone who has direct experience of that issue. If he doesn’t, he usually knows someone who does. Simon also provides people on a part-time basis and has terms of business specially designed for smaller companies who cannot afford the usual up front fee for recruitment. Simon is always pleased to hear from new potential clients. Call him in complete confidence to discuss the issues you are facing in your business.
